Summary: dome shape, with 3-4 lights. was stationary, left and it re-appeared. rolled. and NE unbelievable speed.
divs: Sighting DetailsHeading to Tawas Michigam, going north on M65 almost to M55 when at 9:50pm a dome object with white lights was still in sky. I saw it for 5-6 second. Then it disapeared. My wife looked up and seen it as it appeared seconds later. I hovered slowly going east, did a tight roll and the at great speed went east and was out of sight with-in seconds. We imediatly called our kids and we were in shock of what we saw. When we reached our place, which was less then 2 mi. Away we sat in our car for awaile before we could unpack. The next day it was on my mind so I called my son and asked his to look up if there was any reports of anything unusual. My wife was also looking this up on her Black Berry.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in East Lansing
There were no other sightings in East Lansing on or around May 31st 2013
